text: Oh, he wasn't. His motor-bike had broken down outside and he noticed your car and she was brunette at the roots and I had a redhead on the other arm. He would have told you this, too? No she laughed. He didn't actually see you. Because it was your car I suppose he presumed it was you, all dressed up in your dinner suit.
